results.title: The Genie from down under: customs
results.creator_credit: Jeremy Swan, Patricia Edgar, Phil Jones, ABC-TV (Australia), Australian Children's Television Foundation and British Broadcasting Corporation
results.brief_description: Penelope, Lady Diana and Miss Mossop are arrested by a Customs Officer when they return to England with 20 million pounds provided by the genies. That exact amount has just gone missing from the Royal Mint.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jeremy Swan, Patricia Edgar, Phil Jones, ABC-TV (Australia), Australian Children’s Television Foundation and British Broadcasting Corporation
results.description: Penelope, Lady Diana and Miss Mossop are arrested by a Customs Officer when they return to England with 20 million pounds provided by the genies. That exact amount has just gone missing from the Royal Mint.
description_for_label: Penelope, Lady Diana and Miss Mossop are arrested by a Customs Officer when they return to England with 20 million pounds provided by the genies. That exact amount has just gone missing from the Royal Mint.

results.title: The Genie from down under: good cop, bad genie
results.creator_credit: Brendan Maher, Patricia Edgar, Phil Jones, ABC-TV (Australia), Australian Children's Television Foundation and British Broadcasting Corporation
results.brief_description: Penelope is desperate to win the Cross Country and she does - without any help from the genies. Penelope wishes that Conrad could see her success. He does - but not quite how Penelope would have liked.
results.title_for_label: The Genie from down under: good cop, bad genie
results.creator_credit_for_label: Brendan Maher, Patricia Edgar, Phil Jones, ABC-TV (Australia), Australian Children’s Television Foundation and British Broadcasting Corporation
results.description: Penelope is desperate to win the Cross Country and she does - without any help from the genies. Penelope wishes that Conrad could see her success. He does - but not quite how Penelope would have liked.
description_for_label: Penelope is desperate to win the Cross Country and she does - without any help from the genies. Penelope wishes that Conrad could see her success. He does - but not quite how Penelope would have liked.

results.title: The Genie from down under: where it's at
results.creator_credit: Esben Storm, Patricia Edgar, Phil Jones, ABC-TV (Australia), Australian Children's Television Foundation and British Broadcasting Corporation
results.brief_description: Bruce wants to become human but to do this he must take the opal to the cave where it was mined over a hundred years before. He sets out to trick Penelope into visiting the cave.
results.title_for_label: The Genie from down under: where it’s at
results.creator_credit_for_label: Esben Storm, Patricia Edgar, Phil Jones, ABC-TV (Australia), Australian Children’s Television Foundation and British Broadcasting Corporation
results.description: Bruce wants to become human but to do this he must take the opal to the cave where it was mined over a hundred years before. He sets out to trick Penelope into visiting the cave.

results.title: The Genie from down under: it's my opal and I'll cry if I want to
results.creator_credit: Jeremy Swan, Patricia Edgar, Phil Jones, ABC-TV (Australia), Australian Children's Television Foundation and British Broadcasting Corporation
results.brief_description: Tour operator, Otto von Meister, and his nephew, Conrad, arrive at Townes Downs with a load of tourists. When he learns about the opal Otto recalls that it belonged to their family years before and he and Conrad are desperate to get it back.
results.title_for_label: The Genie from down under: it’s my opal and I’ll cry if I want to
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jeremy Swan, Patricia Edgar, Phil Jones, ABC-TV (Australia), Australian Children’s Television Foundation and British Broadcasting Corporation
results.description: Tour operator, Otto von Meister, and his nephew, Conrad, arrive at Townes Downs with a load of tourists. When he learns about the opal Otto recalls that it belonged to their family years before and he and Conrad are desperate to get it back.

results.title: The Genie from down under: wishing and hoping
results.creator_credit: Esben Storm, Patricia Edgar, Phil Jones, ABC-TV (Australia), Australian Children's Television Foundation and British Broadcasting Corporation
results.brief_description: When upper class English girl Penelope Townes finds a magic opal which contains two Australian genies, Bruce and his son Baz, she thinks all her problems are over, and that she can have anything she wants. Bruce, however, has other ideas.
results.title_for_label: The Genie from down under: wishing and hoping
results.creator_credit_for_label: Esben Storm, Patricia Edgar, Phil Jones, ABC-TV (Australia), Australian Children’s Television Foundation and British Broadcasting Corporation

results.title: Round the twist: lighthouse blues
results.creator_credit: Esben Storm, Antonia Barnard, Australian Children's Television Foundation and Paul Jennings
results.brief_description: Gribble and his partner evict the Twists from the lighthouse in order to build an amusement park. But with the help of some friendly ghosts, the Twists win the battle to save their home.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Esben Storm, Antonia Barnard, Australian Children’s Television Foundation and Paul Jennings

results.title: Round the twist: without my pants
results.creator_credit: Esben Storm, Antonia Barnard, Australian Children's Television Foundation and Paul Jennings
results.brief_description: Pete is inflicted with a bizarre speech defect. He compulsively adds the words “without my pants” to the end of every sentence with hilarious and embarrassing results.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Esben Storm, Antonia Barnard, Australian Children’s Television Foundation and Paul Jennings

results.title: Round the twist: know all
results.creator_credit: Esben Storm, Antonia Barnard, Australian Children's Television Foundation and Paul Jennings
results.brief_description: The Twists find a trunk full of old circus costumes and dress the scarecrow in a clown’s outfit. But the scarecrow comes to life and chases Linda. Fortunately Dad, dressed as a fortune teller, sees and knows all.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Esben Storm, Antonia Barnard, Australian Children’s Television Foundation and Paul Jennings
